info.name: Full on blue google inbox
info.description: This is just a nice inbox-blue theme for google inbox. I makes a lot of things blue because I wanted it that way.
info.additionalInfo:
Version History

Update 0.0.2 
Yay, some improvements. Easier to see unread emails. They were the same font as the read emails before (my bad) So now the unread emails "pop" out a bit.


This is probably version 0.0.1 super alpha
If stuff doesn't work, it's because I haven't noticed them yet. If you find an issue, don't hesitate to contact me =) you can find me at www.luvis.se
